query:
select * from
(
	select * from
	(
		
		select 1    id , '149319114' serial from dual union
		select 2    id , '149261942' serial from dual union
		select 3    id , '149106168' serial from dual
	) left join
	(
		select serial_num, carrier_serial_num , carrier_site
		from carrier_site
	)
	on serial = serial_num
)left join
(
	SELECT JOB, OPN_CODE, PROCESS_LOT
	FROM apps.xxbi_cyp_wip_job_inv_v@osfm
) on serial = JOB
ORDER BY ID
